text: Xi Meijuan () is a Chinese film, television and stage actress. She is a member of the 12th National People's Congress.记者独家专访全国人大代表奚美娟 CNR.com March 12, 2014 ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |+ Film |- ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Year ! style="background:#B0C4DE;" | Title !
